    • Constructor Detail

      • BioptionChatMenu

        public BioptionChatMenu(BioptionMessage msg,
                        MenuAction opt1,
                        MenuAction opt2)
        Creates (but does not show!) a menu with two options. Menu message, option labels, and responses to each option are loaded from the passed BioptionMessage. The provided MenuActions allow for more control over the action of the menu buttons. If there is no desired action for a corresponding action, null should be passed.
        Parameters:
        msg - The fully-encoded message used for menu text
        opt1 - Action enacted when option 1 is clicked by the user
        opt2 - Action enacted when option 2 is clicked by the user

    • Method Detail
